angularBeans.boot

Class ModuleGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • angularBeans.boot.ModuleGenerator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    @SessionScoped
public class ModuleGenerator
extends Object
implements Serializable
    The ModuleGenerator is the main component in the angularBean javaScript generation used by BootServlet
    Author:
    Bessem Hmidi
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • generateBean

        public StringBuffer generateBean(NGBean bean)
        this method concern is the generation of the AngularJS service from the @AngularBean CDI bean.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        a StringBuffer containing the generated angular service code.
